title: Edit existing company profile information
description: As a sales representative, I want to edit company profile information, so that I can keep company records up-to-date as businesses evolve.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am viewing a company profile, when I click the 'Edit' button, then the profile fields become editable
Given I am editing a company profile, when I modify fields and click 'Save', then the changes are persisted and displayed
Given I am editing a company profile, when I click 'Cancel', then my changes are discarded and original values are restored
Given I am editing a company profile, when another user has modified the same company, then I see a conflict warning before saving

definitionOfDone.item: Edit mode UI implemented with inline editing
API endpoint for company updates implemented
